Uses of Interface
schema.WriteOperations.LOBStreamListener

  • Packages that use WriteOperations.LOBStreamListener 
    Package Description
    schema
    A client application that illustrates basic schema design.

    • Uses of WriteOperations.LOBStreamListener in schema

      Methods in schema with parameters of type WriteOperations.LOBStreamListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Version WriteOperations.putLOB(Key lobKey, WriteOperations.LOBStreamListener lobStreamCallback, Durability durability, long lobTimeout, TimeUnit lobTimeoutUnit, long operationTimeout, TimeUnit operationTimeoutUnit)
      Calls KVLargeObject.putLOB and performs retries, at least until the specified timeout(s) have been exceeded, if a FaultException is encountered.
      Version WriteOperations.putLOBIfAbsent(Key lobKey, WriteOperations.LOBStreamListener lobStreamCallback, Durability durability, long lobTimeout, TimeUnit lobTimeoutUnit, long operationTimeout, TimeUnit operationTimeoutUnit)
      Calls KVLargeObject.putLOBIfAbsent and performs retries, at least until the specified timeout(s) have been exceeded, if a FaultException is encountered.
      Version WriteOperations.putLOBIfPresent(Key lobKey, WriteOperations.LOBStreamListener lobStreamCallback, Durability durability, long lobTimeout, TimeUnit lobTimeoutUnit, long operationTimeout, TimeUnit operationTimeoutUnit)
      Calls KVLargeObject.putLOBIfPresent and performs retries, at least until the specified timeout(s) have been exceeded, if a FaultException is encountered.

      Creates a concrete instance of this class representing the desired LOB put or delete operation with the requested parameters described below.
